name: chatdo
description: Slack-like messaging platform built with Next.js, Express, and Socket.IO

scripts.build: pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter api lint && pnpm --filter web lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter api test && pnpm --filter web test
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter api clean && pnpm --filter web clean
